title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 165.2 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 165.2 - Applicability

State Regulations

The Uniform Code of Bridge Inspection shall apply to all
bridges which are publicly owned, operated or maintained as defined in section
230
of the Highway

Law, which carry public highway traffic and shall not apply to bridges that
exclusively carry railroad or subway tracks. This code shall also apply to
bridges which are owned, operated or maintained by railroads and carry public
highway traffic over the railroad. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
165.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
